actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: For the relief of Augusto Ernesto Segovia, Maria Isabel Segovia, Edelmira Isabel Segovia, Perla Franccesca Segovia, and Augusto Thomas Segovia.

summary.text: Declares five named individuals to be eligible for issuance of immigrant visas or for adjustment of status to that of aliens lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: For the relief of Augusto Ernesto Segovia, Maria Isabel Segovia, Edelmira Isabel Segovia, Perla Franccesca Segovia, and Augusto Thomas Segovia.
